member.name: CItemIDFactory.CreateItemID
member.summary: Creates an ItemID from the supplied data.
member.param: A pointer to the client structure that should be copied.
A pointer to an that will be seriallized into the ItemID.
When this method returns, contains a pointer to the ItemID containing the client data and data.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: CItemIDFactory.GetDataFromIDList
member.summary: Gets a read only pointer to the client provided structure in the first ItemID in the IDList.

param.name: pidl
param.para: When this method returns, contains the address of a read only pointer to a client provided structure.

member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If it fails, it returns E_INVALIDARG.

member.name: CItemIDFactory.GetDataFromIDList
member.summary: Gets a read only pointer to the client provided structure in the first ItemID in the IDList.
member.param: A PIDL containing the data.
When this method returns, contains the address of a read only pointer to a client provided structure.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If it fails, it returns E_INVALIDARG.

member.name: CItemIDFactory.GetPropertyFromIDList
member.summary: Gets a property from the within the IDList as a variant, using the key.
member.param: A PIDL identifying the .
The key for the selected property.
When this method returns, contains a pointer to the property. If rkey is not found, pvar will be VT_EMPTY.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

When this method returns, contains a pointer to the property. If rkey is not found, pvar will be VT_EMPTY.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: CItemIDFactory.GetPropertyStorage
member.summary: Gets a read only pointer to the serialized property storage that is used for storing metadata.
member.param: A PIDL that contains the location of the property storage.
When this method returns, contains the size, in bytes, of the storage.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns a read only pointer to the serialized property storage.

member.name: CItemIDFactory.GetPropertyStorageFromIDList
member.summary: create an instance of the based on the serialized property storage associated with the first ItemID.
member.param: A PIDL containing the serialized property storage.
A reference to the IID of the that is obtained by using __uuidof(IPropertyStore).
When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to a new .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: CItemIDFactory.IsDelegateFolder
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value specifying whether the factory is a delegate folder.
member.returns: Returns TRUE if this factory is a delegate folder, otherwise FALSE.

member.name: CItemIDFactory.SetItemAlloc
member.summary: Provides the CItemIDFactory an interface used to allocate and free item IDs.
member.param: A pointer to an interface.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
